wikipedia_page.main: Euan Murray (born 20 January 1994) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a defender for Kilmarnock. He began his career at Motherwell and has also played for, Arbroath, Clyde, Stenhousemuir, Raith Rovers and Dunfermline Athletic as well as English clubs Barrow and Southport, and in the Solomon Islands for Western United.

response: Euan Murray (born 7 August 1980) is a retired Scottish rugby union footballer, whose last club was Pau in the French Top 14.

On 4 October 2012 Worcester Warriors announced that Murray would be joining them effective from November 2012.Euan Murray joins Worcester  Worcester Warriors Official Website During the 2013/14 season, Murray seriously injured his thumb in a freak accident during a team-building exercise at Sixways. BBC website

In 2009, he announced he would no longer be playing on Sundays, out of his commitment to the Christian Sabbath, prompting comparisons to Eric Liddell.Scotland star Euan Murray explains why he won't play rugby for Scotland on Sundays. The Daily Record. Retrieved on 2011-10-01.
